overview: Collection of three short films from Falcon Studios. "Ticket Home" — Young Luke is a footloose farmboy stranded in the big city and meets blond businessman John Carpenter who treats him to an afternoon of heavy mansex.  "Full Service" — Young, blond Mike gets into an intense suck-n-fuck 3-way with macho mechanics Guillermo and Ed Wiley. The action continues when hot blond Bill joins the fun. "Luke" — In the middle of a day's work on the farm, Luke feels himself getting uncontrollably horny, his big cock swelling to full hardness.
title: Ticket Home
